channel.title: Working with 3D Assets on Godot 4 Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Working with 3D Assets on Godot 4 Recipes

item.title: Importing Assets
item.description: Problem You’ve downloaded (or created) a set of 3D assets, including rigged and animated characters, and you want to import it into Godot. Solution For this example, we’ll assume you’ve downloaded the art packs linked in the section description and unzipped them. Before copying the files into your Godot project, notice that there are multiple versions of the assets in different file formats: OBJ, FBX, and GLTF. There are also some extra files such as examples and separate textures in case you want to modify them.
